C_Cpp.clang_format_fallbackStyle: { BasedOnStyle: GNU, ColumnLimit: 120, IndentWidth: 4, TabWidth: 4, BreakBeforeBraces: Attach, BreakAfterReturnType: Automatic, SpaceBeforeParens: ControlStatements, AllowShortBlocksOnASingleLine: Always, AllowShortIfStatementsOnASingleLine: Always, AllowShortFunctionsOnASingleLine: Empty, BreakAfterAttributes: Always }
